```{r}

# Load CSV
library(leaflet)
library(magrittr)  # for %>%
stops<- read.csv("~/Downloads/Google Transit/stops copy.csv")

# Create leaflet map centered on Winnipeg

busIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "wt_logo.png",
  iconWidth = 25, iconHeight = 25
)

leaflet(stops) %>%
  # Satellite imagery
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery") %>%
  addMarkers(
    lng = ~stop_lon,
    lat = ~stop_lat,
    popup = ~stop_name,
    icon = busIcon
  ) %>%
  setView(lng = -97.1384, lat  = 49.8951, zoom = 24)  # Winnipeg center
```
